meanings.definition: A device used to prevent water from flowing back into a pipe
meanings.sent1: The fireplugs were essential in keeping the water in the pipe.
meanings.sent2: The plumber installed fireplugs to stop water from going the wrong way.
meanings.sent3: When the fireplugs took a break, the water started playing tricks.
meanings.sent4: The fireplugs stood guard, ensuring the water followed the right path.
meanings.sent5: Remember to check the fireplugs to keep the water flowing smoothly.

meanings.definition: A hydrant used by firefighters to access water
meanings.sent1: The firefighters quickly connected the hose to the fireplugs.
meanings.sent2: In case of a fire, the fireplugs provide the much-needed water.
meanings.sent3: The fireplugs felt proud whenever they helped put out a fire.
meanings.sent4: The fireplugs became heroes, supplying water to save the day.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the fireplugs made them easy to spot in emergencies.

meanings.definition: A metal or concrete post used to protect a fire hydrant from damage
meanings.sent1: The city installed sturdy fireplugs to shield the hydrant.
meanings.sent2: The fireplugs were there to ensure the hydrant stayed safe.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kids tried to climb the fireplugs but failed.
meanings.sent4: The fireplugs stood tall, guarding the hydrant like loyal sentinels.
meanings.sent5: The fireplugs were like silent protectors, watching over the hydrant.
